item.title: T-Mobile 提前抓住黑客，避免了数据泄露
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，T-Mobile US Inc. 在最近的一次网络漏洞波及客户手机之前，已经将其控制住了。【原文：T-Mobile US Inc. was able to contain a recent network breach before it reached customers’ phones, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通技术主席期待更快的监管审查和更多的首次公开募股
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）技术投资银行部全球主席表示，有数百家私营技术公司正在等待首次公开募股市场的开放，美国大选的明朗化有望为有望上市的公司注入一剂强心针。【原文：There are hundreds of private technology companies waiting for the market for initial public offerings to open up, according to a JPMorgan Chase & Co. global chair of technology investment banking, with clarity on the US election expected to provide a shot in the arm for listing hopefuls.】

item.title: 老虎种子 "基金起诉罗伯逊的公司终止利润分享
item.description: 朱利安-罗伯逊（Julian Robertson）的一家 "老虎种子 "基金提起诉讼，要求宣布 2004 年的投资协议无效，根据该协议，这位已故对冲基金先驱提供了数百万美元的启动资金，以换取未来的利润分成。【原文：One of Julian Robertson’s “Tiger seed” funds is suing to invalidate the 2004 investment deal by which the late hedge fund pioneer provided millions in startup capital in exchange for a share of future profits.】

item.title: 新西兰西太平洋银行首席执行官敦促金融科技认证加速开放银行业务
item.description: 新西兰西太平洋银行首席执行官凯瑟琳-麦格拉思（Catherine McGrath）表示，如果新西兰希望开放银行业务得到消费者的支持，就应该考虑为新兴金融科技公司建立认证制度。【原文：New Zealand should consider an accreditation regime for emerging fintechs if it wants open banking to get support from consumers, according to Westpac New Zealand Chief Executive Office Catherine McGrath.】

item.title: 债券交易员认为空头回报受限，跌势买家出现
item.description: 随着买家的出现，国债市场上的特朗普交易正在碰壁，以阻止大选后债券收益率的飙升。【原文：The Trump trade in the Treasury market is hitting a wall as buyers have emerged to halt the post-election leap in bond yields.】

item.title: 高通公司预计到 2029 年将从扩产竞标中获利 220 亿美元
item.description: 全球最大的智能手机处理器销售商高通公司（Qualcomm Inc.【原文：Qualcomm Inc., the world’s biggest seller of smartphone processors, is expecting its push into new markets to generate an additional $22 billion in annual revenue by fiscal 2029.】

item.title: DT Midstream 将以 12 亿美元收购三条 Oneok 管道
item.description: DT Midstream Inc. 已达成一项协议，将以 12 亿美元的价格从 Oneok Inc.【原文：DT Midstream Inc. has reached an agreement to buy three natural gas transmission pipelines from Oneok Inc. for $1.2 billion.】

item.title: 亚洲加密货币热点从美国引发的创纪录涨势中获得收益
item.description: 诞生于美国的破纪录加密货币涨势正在亚洲留下印记，包括不丹持有的比特币价值跃升至 10 亿美元以上，以及韩国数字资产交易量激增。【原文：A record-breaking crypto rally born in the US is leaving its mark on Asia, including a jump in the value of Bitcoin held by Bhutan to more than $1 billion and a surge in digital-asset trading volumes in South Korea.】

item.title: 特朗普和普京破坏了习近平对低关税稳定世界的推动力
item.description: 对习近平来说，两次全球峰会的主要目标是推动建立一个贸易壁垒更少的和平世界，以便他能集中精力振兴中国经济。唐纳德-特朗普和弗拉基米尔-普京打乱了这些计划。【原文：For Xi Jinping, the main objective during two global summits was to push for a peaceful world with fewer trade barriers so he can focus on reviving China’s economy. Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin disrupted those plans.】

item.title: ADIA、GIC 称即将收购派巴克火灾公司；安全公司持有少数股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿布扎比投资局和新加坡 GIC 私人有限公司正在就收购 Pye-Barker Fire & Safety 少数股权进行深入谈判，包括债务在内，该公司的估值将超过 60 亿美元。【原文：The Abu Dhabi Investment Authority and Singapore’s GIC Pte. are in advanced talks to acquire a minority stake in Pye-Barker Fire & Safety in a deal that would value the company at more than $6 billion including debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 如果没有税收减免，美国电动汽车需求将下降 27
item.description: 据经济学家估计，取消美国电动汽车税收抵免将削弱未来的电动汽车需求，可能会减少四分之一以上，同时对汽油消费的促进作用微乎其微。【原文：Eliminating the US electric vehicle tax credit would dent future EV demand — perhaps by more than a fourth — while providing a trivial boost to gasoline consumption, economists estimate.】

item.title: Pony AI 接近美国上市，与中国的自动驾驶竞争白热化
item.description: 自动驾驶初创公司 Pony AI 公司即将在美国进行首次公开募股，这将受到密切关注，因为唐纳德-特朗普的第二届政府正在考虑采取可能加剧该行业与中国竞争的举措。【原文：Autonomous driving startup Pony AI Inc.’s upcoming US initial public offering will be closely watched, as Donald Trump’s second administration considers moves that could ramp up competition in the sector with China.】

item.title: 市场认为沃什是领导美国财政部的资深候选人
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普尚未宣布他的财政部长人选，但凯文-沃什（Kevin Warsh —）这位华尔街熟知的前美联储董事会成员至少在债券市场赢得了一些支持。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump has yet to announce his pick for Treasury secretary, but Kevin Warsh — a former Federal Reserve board member well known to Wall Street — has at least won some backing in the bond market.】

item.title: 高尔夫能否帮助特朗普在 20 国集团会议上收敛？下一任东道主已经在问了
item.description: 奉承只能让你走得更远。不要示弱，永远不要卑躬屈膝，永远要问困难的问题。【原文：Flattery will only get you so far. Don’t show weakness, never grovel, and always ask the difficult questions.】

item.title: 巴克莱称美联储关键支持措施无法控制回购动荡
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，在下一轮动荡中，隔夜融资市场可能会自顾不暇，因为除非升级，否则美联储的一个关键支持机构无法为整个市场提供支持。【原文：Overnight funding markets may be on their own during the next bout of turbulence as a key Federal Reserve backstop is unable to support the entire space unless upgrades are made, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 监管机构对南非拖欠 2.88 亿美元养老金发出警报
item.description: 南非金融监管机构负责人表示，南非雇主拖欠 52 亿兰特（约合 2.88 亿美元）的养老金缴款，如果数额巨大，可能会使退休人员面临贫困，并破坏退休生态系统的稳定。【原文：The failure by South African employers to pay 5.2 billion rand ($288 million) in pension contributions could leave retirees facing poverty and destabilize the retirement ecosystem if it reaches a significant amount, the head of the financial regulator said.】

item.title: 特朗普任命坎托菲茨杰拉德的卢特尼克为商务部长
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普将任命 Cantor Fitzgerald LP 首席执行官霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）领导商务部，这将是一个可能以全面提高关税提案为导向的政府的核心人选。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump is tapping Cantor Fitzgerald LP chief executive officer Howard Lutnick to lead the Commerce Department, a central pick in an administration that will likely be shaped by sweeping tariff hike proposals.】

item.title: 土耳其寄希望于特朗普解决S-400争端并购买F-35战机
item.description: 在等待乔-拜登总统采取行动多年之后，土耳其寄希望于当选总统唐纳德-特朗普能解除对其使用俄罗斯防空系统的制裁。【原文：After waiting years for action from President Joe Biden, Turkey is pinning its hopes on President-elect Donald Trump to free it from sanctions over its use of a Russian air defense system.】

item.title: 霸菱称公共和私人资产信贷正在融合
item.description: 霸菱有限责任公司（Barings LLC）最近合并了其资产融资的公共和私人投资团队，该公司称这一组织变革将有助于其驾驭公共和私人信贷市场之间日益模糊的界限。【原文：Barings LLC recently combined its public and private investing teams for asset-based finance, an organizational change it says will help it navigate the increasingly blurred lines between public and private credit markets.】

item.title: 银河公司的索恩说：比特币 ETF 期权将降低波动性
item.description: Galaxy Digital 公司的亚历克斯-索恩（Alex Thorn）认为，价值 430 亿美元的 iShares 比特币信托基金的期权可能会降低波动性，增加原始加密货币的投资者基础。【原文：The availability of options on the sector leading $43 billion iShares Bitcoin Trust is likely to reduce volatility and increase the investor base for the original cryptocurrency, according to Galaxy Digital’s Alex Thorn.】

item.title: 俄罗斯的核理论是什么？普京是如何改变这一理论的？
item.description: 俄罗斯军事战术的一个显著特点是不排除在常规战争中使用核武器。【原文：A distinctive feature of Russia’s military tactics has been that it doesn’t rule out using nuclear weapons in a conventional war.】

item.title: 战略转型：Salesforce 计划在收购公司裁员
item.description: Salesforce Inc. 正计划裁减 Own 公司的员工，该公司是 Salesforce 以约 20 亿美元收购的数据管理初创公司。【原文：Salesforce Inc. is planning to cut workers at Own, the data management startup it acquired for about $2 billion.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会主席称仍在评估美国国债海外清算问题
item.description: 美国最高衍生品监管机构仍在评估在海外清算美国国债的风险，这一结果可能会影响 Cantor Fitzgerald LP 首席执行官 Howard Lutnick 与 CME Group Inc.【原文：The top US derivatives regulator is still assessing the risks of clearing US Treasuries abroad, an outcome that could impact plans by Cantor Fitzgerald LP Chief Howard Lutnick to compete with CME Group Inc.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司 10 亿美元的垃圾债券交易提供了债券优惠
item.description: 市政债券市场的滞后运行为渴望获得额外收益的公司债券投资者提供了机会。【原文：The municipal-bond market’s lagging run is opening up an opportunity for corporate-debt investors eager to secure extra yield.】

item.title: T.罗威公司因2025年通胀波动性而削减高等级信贷赌注
item.description: T.罗尔-普莱斯集团公司（T Rowe Price Group Inc.【原文：T. Rowe Price Group Inc. is in risk-off form in parts of the credit markets, anticipating pressure on yields from higher inflation next year will make the stability of bank loans preferable to the volatility of bonds.】

item.title: 拉詹告诉美国：遏制债务，为下一次大流行做好准备
item.description: 印度储备银行前行长拉古拉姆-拉詹（Raghuram Rajan）说，在一个比以前更容易发生流行病的世界里，不能任由美国和其他国家的高额公共债务继续恶化。【原文：High public debt can’t be left to fester in the US and its peers in a world that is prone to more pandemics than before, former Reserve Bank of India governor Raghuram Rajan said.】

item.title: 睡眠国度考虑在罕见的杠杆收购中出售潜在债券
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，睡乡加拿大控股公司（Sleep Country Canada Holdings Inc.【原文：Sleep Country Canada Holdings Inc. is talking to investors about a potential Canadian-dollar bond sale to finance its C$1.7 billion acquisition by Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd. in what would be a rare leveraged buyout funded by loonie-denominated bonds, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 股价下跌，法国燃料分销商鲁比斯（Rubis）被指将探索出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国燃料分销商 Rubis SCA 正在探索包括潜在出售在内的各种选择，在此之前，该公司股价在过去六年中下跌了一半以上。【原文：French fuel distributor Rubis SCA is exploring options including a potential sale, according to people familiar with the matter, after its shares slumped by more than half over the past six years.】

item.title: Blackstone 看好证券化市场对 Jersey Mike's 的收购
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正考虑利用证券化债务市场为其收购 Jersey Mike's 的多数股权融资。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering tapping the securitized debt market to help finance its acquisition of a majority stake in Jersey Mike’s, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 微软与新闻集团旗下哈珀柯林斯签订人工智能学习协议
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，微软公司与新闻集团旗下的哈珀-柯林斯公司达成协议，允许这家软件公司使用该图书出版商的非小说类图书来训练其人工智能模型。【原文：Microsoft Corp. reached a deal with News Corp.’s HarperCollins that will allow the software company to use nonfiction titles from the book publisher to train its artificial intelligence models, according to a person familiar with the matter.】
